Experiences

Systems & Software Developer Intern

Government of Ontario

May 2023 - Aug 2023

Toronto, ON

Modernized coroner databases in SQL and Microsoft Access by streamlining data retrieval and reducing unncessary computation, resulting in a 22% decrease in lookup and report build time.

Developed new website in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for forensic pathologists to log 1300+ intake cases during my term.

Implemented a Tensorflow based machine learning model in Python to identify bias in case narratives, sociodemographic data, scene descriptions, and coroners' notes with 86% accuracy.

Technologies Used:  Python, SQL, Tensorflow, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

Full Stack Software Developer

Alibi

Apr 2023 - Aug 2023

Mississauga, ON

Developed front-end components for cross platform mobile application using React Native that accrued 600+ bookings through 8 venues around the GTA

Designed wireframes for user flow in Figma and implemented profile, settings, and booking pages using React Native and Tailwind CSS

Configured one time password verification and account management of 410+ users using Firebase authentication

Technologies Used:  React Native, Tailwind CSS, Firebase Auth, Figma, Cloud Storage, Tailwind CSS, Python, Stripe, Figma

VP of Projects

Western Computer Science Undergraduate Society

Dec 2022 - Present

London, ON

Leading 3 teams of 4 developers and designers to create various projects for the club: a natural learning computer vision model to track foot traffic, a 2d platformer created with the Unity Engine, and a mock food ordering service.

Networking with other organizations to make websites for their clubs including Ivey Business School, something, and something

Technologies Used:  React.js, Node.js, Tensorflow, C++, Unity, Tailwind CSS, Typescript, Figma

VP of Internals

Western Developer Society

Aug 2023 - Present

London, ON

Working with 14 mentors and 80 students to create a mentorship program to allow younger students the opportunity to learn how to break into the tech industry.

Planned 6 events throughout the year to improve cohesiveness among the tech community within the club and at Western University as a whole.

Technologies Used:  React.js, Node.js, Javascript, Figma

My name is Pranav and I'm a computer science student at Western University!

Most recently, I worked as a developer at the Government of Ontario where I've aided in building tools to visualize data and creating components to improve user experience.

I'm interested in working with big data to solve problems around the world and getting involved in more projects for small businesses in my community around me.

Outside of school, you can find me working out, reading manga, or cooking burritos. That being said, I'd love to get in touch. Feel free to connect with me about any opportunities or if you'd just like to chat!
